text:
As an American Muslim,
I believe that there

is a life after this
death, and therefore,

that my purpose is
to try and achieve

I think what that
means for me personally

trying to be the best
person that I can be.

Being a person of
character of morals

with really great manners,
someone who is honest,

and kind, and just and fair to
everyone, my friends, family,

the people that
are all around me

regardless of their beliefs
and their backgrounds.

And I think it also
means that my purpose is

to make this world a
better place especially

the local communities
that I'm a part of.
